'''2.3.115''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on April 2, 2022 as a beta version for {{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}} (old launcher) and {{w|macOS}}, and April 6, 2022<ref group=note>The date of the inspection, the actual release date could be earlier.</ref> as a beta version for {{w|Linux}} and as a non-beta version for {{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}} (old launcher) and {{w|macOS}}.
